title: Remontons les Champs-Elysees = Let's Walk Back Up to the Champs-Elysees
description: In order to break the routine of his lessons, a school teacher decides to tell his pupils the story of the Champs-Elysees, from the Renaissance to Napoleon III. This light historical comedy is a pretext for Guitry to play five roles and to play games with historical facts and famous characters.  Credits: Producers, Guy Lacourt, Serge Sandberg ; directors, Robert Bibal, Sacha Guitry ; writer, Sacha Guitry ; photography, Jean Bachelet ; music, Adolphe Borchard ; stills photographer, Raymond Voinquel. Cast: Sacha Guitry, Jean Davy, Jacqueline Delubac, Jane Marken, Mila Parely, Jeanne Boitel, Lucien Baroux.
